title: How dangerous is it to live in a damp, mouldy home?
description: The death of two-year-old Awaab Ishak from exposure to mould has shown the consequences of uninhabitable homes. But how many people are living in similarly unhealthy conditions and what can be done to protect their health?. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: How dangerous is it to live in a damp, mouldy home?
creator: The Guardian
